heading: Today
text: Becoming cloudy. A chance of showers north late morning and afternoon.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Rain, tapering to showers south, changing to snow over the higher terrain north after midnight.

heading: Thursday
text: Windy. Snow showers north and mountains ending. Increasing sun west and south.

heading: Friday
text: Thickening clouds. Rising chance of showers west to east.
